channel.title: Client jar making problem
channel.description:
I have a problem making a jar for my client. It jars fine, it loads fine, then after you log in, it shows a loading please wait screen in black, forever, then when I run it unjared I login fine. Does anyone know why this is?
I used jar maker, and set manifest template to client.

item.title: Client jar making problem
item.dc:creator: @bjc22 bjc22
item.description:
@bjc22 wrote:

Ive tried jaring with every client source and every jar making thing I could find.

Read full topic

item.title: Client jar making problem
item.dc:creator: @masta_toxik masta toxik
item.description:
@masta_toxik wrote:

try to make a new jar… same thing just a new one ur jar maker might hav made a fault mine did once then i did it again and it worked fine…

Read full topic
